Exception.NoOperandsAndVariables: Input string doesn't contain any variables or operands
Exception.BracketsNesting: Brackets nesting is violated at position
Exception.OperationBeforeRBracket: Operation before right bracket at position
Exception.NoOperandAfterLBracket: No operand after left bracket at position
Exception.BracketsNumberIsNotEqual: Left brackets number is not equal that right brackets number
Exception.NoOperandAfterInversion: No operand after inversion at position
Exception.LastSymbolIsInversion: Last symbol in string is inversion
Exception.SequenceOfVariablesIsBroken: The sequence of variables is broken at position
Exception.IncorrectOperationChanging: Can't read all variables because of incorrect operation changing at position
Exception.ExcessiveComma: An excessive comma at the beginning or the ending of enumeration
Exception.IncorrectEnumeration: The enumeration of constituents is broken at position
Exception.TooManyBrackets: The number of brackets is not equal to 1
